channel.title: Duck Finance smart contracts on
channel.description: Recent content in Duck Finance smart contracts on

item.description: AddressesCheckList.vy # vyper: 0.2.10 Events # CommitOwnership admin : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership admin : address, notIndexed Methods # transferOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 37651 Sets new future owner address Callable by owner only Arguments: _futureOwner: - New future owner address applyOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 38507 Applies new future owner address as current owner

BoostingController.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Boosting Controller Events # Boost account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed lockTime : uint256, notIndexed Unboost account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed CommitOwnership admin : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership admin : address, notIndexed Methods # boost # type: nonpayable function

Controller.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Controller Controls liquidity Reaper's and the emission of coins through the Reapers. Add/remove Reaper from voting/emission. Events # StartMinting owner : address, notIndexed AddReaper reaper : address, notIndexed RemoveReaper reaper : address, notIndexed CommitOwnership owner : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership owner : address, notIndexed Methods # init # type: nonpayable constructor

InitialEmissionDistributor.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Initial Emission Distributor Events # CommitOwnership owner : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership owner : address, notIndexed StartClaiming ts : uint256, notIndexed Claim account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed Methods # transferOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 39071 Transfers ownership by setting new owner _futureOwner candidate

Reaper.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Reaper Events # Deposit account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed feeOptimization : bool, notIndexed Withdraw account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed Kill admin : address, notIndexed Unkill admin : address, notIndexed CommitOwnership owner : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership

stakers/CurveStaker.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Curve Staker Events # CommitOwnership owner : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership owner : address, notIndexed Methods # transferOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 39131 Transfers ownership by setting new owner _futureOwner candidate Callable by owner only. Emit CommitOwnership event with _futureOwner Arguments: _futureOwner: - Future owner address applyOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 41287

strategies/CurveReaperStrategyV1.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Curve Reaper Strategy V1 Events # CommitOwnership owner : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership owner : address, notIndexed Methods # transferOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 39101 Transfers ownership by setting new owner _futureOwner candidate Callable by owner only. Emit CommitOwnership event with _futureOwner Arguments: _futureOwner: - Future owner address applyOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 41257

strategies/UniswapReaperStrategyV1.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Uniswap Reaper Strategy V1 Events # CommitOwnership owner : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership owner : address, notIndexed Methods # transferOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 39101 Transfers ownership by setting new owner _futureOwner candidate Callable by owner only. Emit CommitOwnership event with _futureOwner Arguments: _futureOwner: - Future owner address applyOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 41257

testing/ERC20Basic.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT ERC20 Events # Transfer _from : address, indexed _to : address, indexed _value : uint256, notIndexed Approval _owner : address, indexed _spender : address, indexed _value : uint256, notIndexed CommitOwnership admin : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership admin : address, notIndexed Methods # transferOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 39161

tokens/FarmToken.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Dispersion Farm Token Based on the ERC-20 token standard. Emission is halved every year. Burnable and Mintable ERC20 token with linear mining supply, rate changes every year. INITIAL_SUPPLY(premine for pool initialization -> 5_000 and early birds -> 400_000) = 405_000. Emission for the first year will be between 500_000 and 1_000_000. For second year will be between 250_000 and 500_000, etc (lazy auto-updating).

tokens/StakableERC20.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Stakable ERC20 Token Based on the ERC-20 token standard. USDN for example. Mintable and Stakable ERC20 token. balanceOf(account) = balances[account] * p(n) / p(i), p(n) = p(n-1) * (1 + reward / totalSupply). Reward is not stake for funds deposited recently. Events # Transfer sender : address, indexed receiver : address, indexed value : uint256, notIndexed Approval

tokens/StrictTransferableToken.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Strict Transferable Token Based on the ERC-20 token that cannot be freely transferred. Transfer awailable for contracts and accounts from transferableAccountCheckList only. decimals() = 18. Burnable and Mintable ERC20 token. Events # Transfer sender : address, indexed receiver : address, indexed value : uint256, notIndexed Approval owner : address, indexed spender : address, indexed value : uint256, notIndexed CommitOwnership

VotingController.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Voting Controller For voting, Reaper's from Controller are used. ontrols voting for the distribution of farm token emission by Reaper's. Events # Vote reaper : address, notIndexed coin : address, notIndexed account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed Unvote reaper : address, notIndexed coin : address, notIndexed account : address, notIndexed amount : uint256, notIndexed StartVoting

WhiteList.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT White List Events # CommitOwnership admin : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership admin : address, notIndexed AddAddress _address : address, notIndexed RemoveAddress _address : address, notIndexed Methods # init # type: nonpayable constructor Contract constructor owner = msg.sender. addAddress # type: nonpayable function gas: 39147
